java/liquibase/database/sql/RenameColumnStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 public class RenameColumnStatement implements SqlStatement {
00007 
00008     private String schemaName;
00009     private String tableName;
00010     private String oldColumnName;
00011     private String newColumnName;
00012     private String columnDataType;
00013 
00014     public RenameColumnStatement(String schemaName, String tableName, String oldColumnName, String newColumnName, String columnDataType) {
00015         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00016         this.tableName = tableName;
00017         this.oldColumnName = oldColumnName;
00018         this.newColumnName = newColumnName;
00019         this.columnDataType = columnDataType;
00020     }
00021 
00022     public String getSchemaName() {
00023         return schemaName;
00024     }
00025 
00026     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00027         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00028     }
00029 
00030     public String getTableName() {
00031         return tableName;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00035         this.tableName = tableName;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public String getOldColumnName() {
00039         return oldColumnName;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public void setOldColumnName(String oldColumnName) {
00043         this.oldColumnName = oldColumnName;
00044     }
00045 
00046     public String getNewColumnName() {
00047         return newColumnName;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public void setNewColumnName(String newColumnName) {
00051         this.newColumnName = newColumnName;
00052     }
00053 
00054     public String getColumnDataType() {
00055         return columnDataType;
00056     }
00057 
00058     public void setColumnDataType(String columnDataType) {
00059         this.columnDataType = columnDataType;
00060     }
00061 
00062 
00063     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00064         if (!supportsDatabase(database)) {
00065             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(this, database);
00066         }
00067 
00068         if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00069             return "exec sp_rename '" + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + "." + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getOldColumnName()) + "', '" + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getNewColumnName()) + "'";
00070         } else if (database instanceof MySQLDatabase) {
00071             if (getColumnDataType() == null) {
00072                 throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("columnDataType is required to rename columns", this, database);
00073             }
00074 
00075             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " CHANGE " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getOldColumnName()) + " " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getNewColumnName()) + " " + getColumnDataType();
00076         } else if (database instanceof HsqlDatabase) {
00077             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getOldColumnName()) + " RENAME TO " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getNewColumnName());
00078         } else if (database instanceof FirebirdDatabase) {
00079             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ALTER COLUMN " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getOldColumnName()) + " TO " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getNewColumnName());
00080         } else if (database instanceof MaxDBDatabase) {
00081           return "RENAME COLUMN " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + "." + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getOldColumnName()) + " TO " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getNewColumnName());
00082         }
00083 
00084         return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " RENAME COLUMN " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getOldColumnName()) + " TO " + database.escapeColumnName(getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getNewColumnName());
00085     }
00086 
00087     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00088         return ";";
00089     }
00090 
00091     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00092         return !(database instanceof DB2Database
00093                 || database instanceof CacheDatabase
00094                 || database instanceof DerbyDatabase
00095                 || database instanceof SQLiteDatabase);
00096     }
00097 }
